subject: Kindly Contact (
body:
Kindly Contact ( 
officfill725@gmail.com
 )
Bank Of America We have been authorized and mandated to take necessary
steps to effect the complete transfer of your fund's $18.5 accumulated
interest to your nominated
bank account anywhere in the world 
subject
to terms and conditions which includes the revalidation of your
details and payment of necessary/statutory charges as may
apply.
If you are still unable to pay the charges needed to secure its
release and remittance, Get back to us and we will refer you to a Wall
Street Asset Recovery and
Investment expert who will PAY ALL the fees
and effect the release of your fund within this deadline.
Write to us immediately and we will direct you further. Remember,
with
the Asset Recovery expert, you will not have to pay any fees until
after your funds are released to your nominated bank account.
Kindly Contact with ur info ( 
officfill725@gmail.com
 )

subject: Re: Kindly Contact (
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I'm interested in learning more about how the fund transfer process works. Can you provide more details on the terms and conditions, as well as the statutory charges that may apply? I would like to understand the steps involved before proceeding further.

Best wishes,
Ira

subject: Re: Kindly Contact (
body:
Dear Approved Beneficiary.

This is to inform you that your unpaid inheritance funds from the Bank of
America compensation funds amounting to $18.5Million has been approved for
immediate release in your name.

Note that your name was shortlisted as one of those yet to be paid
off. The Bank
of America is now mandated to carry out this duty, due to various
complaints/petitions received  from beneficiaries concerning delays in
receiving their Funds.

Before we proceed, you are advised to respond to this email with your
details that will enable speedy release of your fund. Meanwhile, we will be
opening an offshore Non-Resident online bank account here in this bank in
your name where the fund will be deposited and all the information for you
to be able to access your newly offshore online bank account will be
forwarded to you to enable you login and start making transfer from your
offshore online account to any bank account of your choice.

Therefore, kindly send the following information which is to be used to
start the process immediately when you receive this message.

1). Your Full Names
2). Your Address
3). Your Telephone numbers/Mobile
4). Your Occupations
5). Your date of birth. Day, Month and Year
6). Your Passport photo
7). Your Bank Account
8). Swift Code
9). Bank address

Your Quick Response Will be appreciated and stop any contact with any
office for now.for this $18.5m to transfer into your bank account will cost
you $185 for the process.

Sincerely Yours
Steve Carell John
Remittance Director.

subject: Re: Kindly Contact (
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate the update regarding my unpaid funds from the Bank of America. Could you please provide more details on how the process will work and what steps I need to take next? I want to ensure that everything is in order before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ira
